mapper.select:
SELECT p.product_id, p.name, p.color_name, p.price, p.created_at, p.view_count, p.wish_count, p.seller_id, s.seller_name, f.file_id, f.file_name, f.store_name, f.file_path, f.copyright, f.copyright_url FROM nextjs_shop_product p JOIN nextjs_shop_seller s ON s.seller_id = p.seller_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pi_inner.product_id, pi_inner.file_id FROM nextjs_shop_product_image pi_inner INNER JOIN ( SELECT product_id, MIN(sort_key) AS min_sort_key FROM nextjs_shop_product_image GROUP BY product_id ) first_img ON pi_inner.product_id = first_img.product_id AND pi_inner.sort_key = first_img.min_sort_key ) tpi ON tpi.product_id = p.product_id LEFT JOIN nextjs_shop_file f ON f.file_id = tpi.file_id WHERE p.sale_stop = 0 AND p.menu_sub_id = #{menuSubId}
AND (p.created_at, p.product_id) < (#{lastCreatedAt}, #{lastProductId})
ORDER BY p.created_at DESC, p.product_id DESC
AND ( (p.view_count + p.wish_count) < #{lastPopularity} OR ( (p.view_count + p.wish_count) = #{lastPopularity} AND (p.created_at, p.product_id) < (#{lastCreatedAt}, #{lastProductId}) ) )
ORDER BY (p.view_count + p.wish_count) DESC, p.created_at DESC, p.product_id DESC
ORDER BY p.product_id DESC
LIMIT 30
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO nextjs_shop_cart(product_option_id, user_id, quantity) VALUES(#{productOptionId}, #{userId}, #{quantity})
mapper.select: SELECT product_id, name, color_name, price, created_at, like_count, view_count, wish_count, sale_stop, seller_id, menu_sub_id, material_info, manufacturer_name, country_of_origin, wash_care_info, manufactured_ym, quality_guarantee_info, after_service_contact, after_service_manager, after_service_phone FROM nextjs_shop_product WHERE sale_stop = 0 AND product_id = #{productId}

SELECT uc.user_coupon_id, uc.used, c.coupon_id, c.description, c.coupon_code, c.discount_type, c.discount_value, c.max_discount, c.minimum_order_before_amount, c.status, c.is_stackable, c.is_product_restricted, c.amount, c.start_date, c.end_date, c.created_at, c.updated_at, c.seller_id, s.seller_name FROM nextjs_shop_user_coupon uc JOIN nextjs_shop_coupon c ON c.coupon_id = uc.coupon_id JOIN nextjs_shop_coupon_allowed ca ON ca.coupon_id = c.coupon_id AND product_id = #{productId} LEFT JOIN nextjs_shop_seller s ON s.seller_id = c.seller_id WHERE uc.user_id = #{userId} AND uc.used = 0

SELECT product_qna_id, question, created_at, answer, res_created_at, secret, product_qna_type_id, product_id, user_id FROM nextjs_shop_product_qna WHERE product_id = #{productId} ORDER BY CASE WHEN user_id = #{userId} THEN 0 ELSE 1 END ASC, created_at DESC, product_qna_id DESC;
